object.name: blackberry.invoke.CameraArguments
object.comment: The CameraArguments object is an instance object, and is used as a parameter to the invoke() method when invoking the Camera application or Recorder application.
object.details: The CameraArguments object must be created as an instance using the new keyword.
object.example:
<script type="text/javascript"> var args = new blackberry.invoke.CameraArguments(); args.view = 1; // Video Recorder
blackberry.invoke.invoke(blackberry.invoke.APP_CAMERA, args); // Video Recorder Application </script>

ctor.comment: Constructor for a new CameraArguments object.

property.name: view
property.comment: Value that specifies what kind of camera application you want to open.
